The post August 2022 Aries Horoscope – Next Month’s Aries Horoscope | August Horoscope appeared first on Manomay Jyotish.
item.content:encoded:
General

The month of August 2022 can give mixed results to the natives with the Aquarius zodiac sign. The presence of planets in your Kundli, especially, Sun, Venus, and Mercury will impact different aspects of your life. In the second week of the month, Venus and Sun will remain positioned in the fourth house in Aries; as a result, you may be assigned new responsibilities at the workplace.

On the other hand, Saturn, the ruling lord of your deeds, being present in its own house may inspire you to work hard, and thus, you may get positive results. The month of August 2022 can be a bit challenging from a health point of view. You are likely to confront health-related problems because of the presence of Mercury,

the ruling of your sixth house, in the twelfth position from its own house. Let’s move forward and know what the month of August 2022 has on a platter for you.

Career

From the career point of view, the month of August 2022 is likely to remain average for Aries. During this period, Saturn, the ruling lord of your tenth house, will stay in your tenth in a retrograde position after transiting from the eleventh house, due to which, you can be seen working hard for the success of your work. In the first half of the month, the work which has gone astray can come back because of the presence of Venus and Sun in your fourth house.

Owing to these two planets, new opportunities for employment will knock at your door. During this time, those natives who are looking for a job are likely to meet success. On the other hand, the period may prove to be approved for those who are associated or employed with foreign companies or those related to overseas business.

There is an excellent possibility that you may be fully rewarded for your labour. In the second half of the month, Sun will transit and form a conjunction with Mercury, leading to the formation of Budhaditya Yoga. During this time, there is a strong possibility of opening new employment opportunities for you.

Finance

If we see things from a financial point of view, the month of August 2022 is likely to be profitable for Aries. During this period, Venus, the ruling lord of your second house, the house of money or family, will reside in your fourth house, the house of comforts, with Sun, and thus, there can be an increase in your material pleasure.

Along with this, you may also have financial gains. At the same time, you are likely to have full benefits of your labour due to the presence of Saturn, the ruling lord of the eleventh house, the house of profits, and tenth house, the house of Karma, in your tenth house. During this period, you can be seen faring well in your career. The income of service people is likely to increase.

Those associated with the business may experience profitable times. However, you are suggested not to borrow or lend money because of the presence of Rahu with Mars in your first house in the same month i.e., August 2022 and if you do so, you may come across several challenges while returning or getting back the money. The period may be favourable for those engaged in foreign business. The natives of this zodiac sign may be successful in saving money and therefore, they will be financially sound.

Health

So far the health of Aries people is concerned, the month of August 2022 is going to give mixed results. During this period, Mercury, the ruling lord of your sixth house, the house of disease, will be present in the twelfth house from its own house and as a result, the natives may confront health-related troubles. You are advised to avoid eating outside during this time. You may also suffer from venereal diseases. Too much exertion can create physical as well as mental problems. In such a situation, take out some time for yourself so that you can have some physical rest, otherwise, you may fall ill.

In this month, you will be seen helping others rather than taking care of yourself due to the aspect of Jupiter on your sixth house, the house of disease and this may impact your health adversely. In this regard, you are advised to pay equal heed to your health as well. In the second half of the month, the Sun will be present in your fifth house, due to which, you may be relieved of prolonged diseases. Seeing improvement in the health of elders, you may feel mentally comfortable.

Love/Marriage/Personal Relations

The first fortnight of August 2022 is likely to be approved from the love angle for Aries. At the beginning of the month, Mercury, the significator of intelligence and communication, will be transiting in the fifth house, the house of children and education. Owing to this very reason, your relationship with your lover can be pleasant.

At the same time, Sun, the ruling lord of your fifth house, will form a conjunction with Venus in your fourth house, the house of comforts, and therefore, you are advised to have control over your language while interacting with your lover or spouse, otherwise, bitterness may crop up in your relations.

Try to sort things out amicably instead of frowning. Material pleasures in married life or love relationships may increase due to the presence of Venus, the benefactor of material pleasures, in your fourth house. The natives of the Aries zodiac sign should listen to the worries of their lover or spouse and try to understand their emotions. If Venus is strongly placed in your horoscope, the relations will bloom.

Family & Friends

During the first fifteen days of the month, your family life may be comfortable due to the transit of Venus and Sun in your fourth house, the house of comforts and mother. During this time, love and affection among family members can increase and positive signs may be visible all around. Family members may ponder over resolving past conflicts through mutual discussions.

You can play a pivotal role to eradicate the problems occurring in your family life with your intelligence and maturity, as a result, a pleasant atmosphere may prevail in the family. Mercury, the ruling of your third house, is transiting in your fifth house, the house of children or education, and as a result,

your understanding with your father, and brothers, & sisters is likely to strengthen. Married natives are likely to be benefitted from in-laws and your relationship with them may turn out better.

Advice

Recite the Bajrang Baan Path and offer Bhog to Lord Hanuman.
Offer Churma to Lord Hanuman.
Donate mustard oil in the Shani temple on Saturday.
Worship the Sun on Sunday.

item.content:encoded:

item.content:encoded:
Aquarius Zodiac

karma will increase

Hello!

I am Pro.Mrs. Sneha Mane warmly welcomes all the astrologers and people. | Aquarius Zodiac | Planets travel continuously. They enter from one zodiac sign to another through transits. They have good or bad effect on human life. We are constantly analyzing these zodiac changes of the planets. Accordingly, all the planets are changing their zodiac signs in the coming April. In this, the change of zodiac sign of Guru Maharaj, who is called a natural benefic planet, will be auspicious for all the zodiac signs in many ways. Because they are entering your voice. Guru Maharaj’s zodiac will change on 13th April and we are analyzing their effects according to the zodiac. In today’s episode how can we change this sign of Guru Maharaj to Aquarius? We will discuss this in detail. | Aquarius Zodiac |

To understand this better, we have to first understand the information about Jupiter and its causation. Of all the planets, Moon, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus are known as the four natural benefic planets. However, the condition applies to the moon that the moon near the full moon is considered auspicious and the moon near the new moon is considered inauspicious. The farther the Moon is from the Sun, the further away it is from the houses. Apart from this, many conditions apply to the Moon from the point of view of auspiciousness. Mercury is also a natural benefic planet. However, the direction of its influence changes according to the planet with which it occurs. So somewhere there is a lack of his natural goodness. Then Jupiter and Venus are the only two auspicious planets left. Venus usually changes its zodiac within a month. That is, he gives all the good and bad results in a month. That is, the presence of Venus gives auspiciousness for small incidents. But Guru Maharaj stays in one zodiac for about 13 months. #astroguru   #astroguruma #guruparivartan | Aquarius Zodiac |

Also their vision has a lot to do with it. For all the other auspicious planets, the seventh is the only aspect. But Guru Maharaj has a total of three darshans named Pancham, Seventh and Navam. The important thing is that being a natural benefic planet, their vision is more important than the location. Actually their eyes are considered like nectar. In other words, Guru Maharaj has the power to stay in the zodiac for 13 months and also gives auspicious places to four places in the magazine. According to the cause and effect of the four places, very auspicious results are given to the natives. That is why the change in the form of Guru Maharaj or his zodiac sign is very important. Now this is going to be especially important. Because they are about to embark on a pleasant journey, a journey that has been negative for the past three years. In our language, Guru Maharaj has been walking on rocky roads for the last three years. Even though he himself is on a rocky path, he has given as many auspicious results as he can. However, since his visit was in a state of conflict, it naturally affected the general public. After entering his Pisces sign, he will now begin his journey on a good four-lane road. As a result, everyone will get their very auspicious results. In this way, Guru Maharaj is entering Pisces from Aquarius on 13th April. What will be the effect of this zodiac sign on Aquarius? Let us understand it now.

If you see from the point of view of Aquarius, then Guru Maharaj will come to your second place. Actually Guru Maharaj is not the planet of your zodiac. However Guru Maharaja’s position, his zodiac change is always very important for you. Because they are your Dhanesh and Benefesh. He is the lord of the second and eleventh house in Aquarius. The second place in the magazine is considered the place of wealth, the voice of the family. Therefore, we consider the eleventh house as the place of profit and fulfillment of desires. Considering the causality of these two places, very important things come under the jurisdiction of Guru Maharaj. Now they are going to enter your second place in their Pisces. Due to which this situation will be created in Dhanesh wealth. Which is considered very auspicious. You will get very auspicious results during this period. Your speech will attain enlightenment and spiritual level. When you create a topic, your study, your knowledge will show through that structure. People who are Aquarius born writers will be able to delve into their writing. Wisdom will be reflected in the voice of the speakers. | Aquarius Zodiac |

Overall, Guru Maharaja entering the second place will benefit you in many ways. More importantly, Guru Maharaja in second place will be able to complete the economic triangle in the magazine alone. Because Dhanasthan is one of the places of the triangle and Guru Maharaj who comes in any position of the triangle alone has the ability to complete the triangle. Also, since this is your Dhanesh and benesh, you will get a lot of benefits from this triangle. The magazine covers various yogas. Economic triangle is a very important and beneficial yoga. This yoga is formed by the sum of the third, sixth and tenth yogas. Now that Guru Maharaja will enter your second position, his vision will move to the sixth and tenth position. So this economic triangle is going to end here. This triangle is considered very important for monetization. Because earning money is the basic need of the world. One cannot deny that most other problems are easily solved with adequate income. Earning money is very important especially in today’s modern world. which you are going to get. #astroguru #guruparivartan

 Another important factor is that your family may develop during this time. It can also be called auspicious effect. Of course, this increase can happen in different ways. A new child may be born in the family. Marriage of boy or girl. This method can also lead to the development of the family. In short, in the second place, Guru Maharaj will give you auspicious results and benefits along with earning money. You have to be more discriminatory in the support you provide to other people.

It is said that when good times begin, good things happen to us in many ways. The arrival of Guru Maharaj in the second place can be said to be the beginning of good times for you. Because Guru Maharaj is not going to give you money alone. Apart from this, they will be good for you in many other ways. He has a total of three ideas, the fifth, the seventh and the ninth. Their vision is more important than their position. Because his vision is called nectar vision. Accordingly, the fifth sight of Guru Maharaj will fall on your sixth position in the second place. From the sixth position in the magazine we look at health, job, debt, competitors, enemies. The result of Guru Maharaj’s auspicious vision at this place is stability in the job, creating opportunities for advancement, bringing forth one’s work in the field, changing the direction of work. Along with this, the right castes will also get promotion opportunities. Those who need loan can get it easily. Your opponents will not be able to do much harm to you. They will be more engaged in their work. Because the Cancer of the Moon comes in your sixth house. Jupiter and Moon are friendly planets. So from this point of view you will get more auspicious results.

After this, the seventh sight of Guru Maharaj will fall on your eighth place. Aquarius is a very intelligent creature. According to this, the effect of this vision is that if you are doing some intellectual work, doing research, if you are doing a deep study of a subject, then the chances of success in that work will increase greatly. प्रेमाची कथाप्रेम ही एक निसर्गाने दिलेली देणगी आहे. समाजामध्ये सर्व लोकांमध्ये आपापला मध्ये स्नेह, प्रेम, जिव्हाळा, सहकार्य असले की व्यक्ती मधील प्रेम टिकून राहते. नुकत्याच वयात आलेल्या तरुण-तरुणी मधील आवडता विषय म्हणजे प्रेम.उर्मिला तिच्या बाबतीत हे घडत होते. तीही कोणाच्यातरी प्रेमात पडली होती. मयूर हे तिच्यावर प्रेम करीत होता. हे प्रेम भावना दोघांच्या मनात खेळत होती. परंतु याबाबतीत कोणालाच काहीच माहीत नव्हते.तसे बघायला गेले तर उर्मिलालाचे नुकतेच आईचे छत्र हरवले होते. त्यामुळे ती तिच्या मावशीकडे आली होती. मावशीच्या गावातील कॉलेजच्या तिसऱ्या वर्षाला शिक्षण घेत होती. गेली दोन वर्षे ती प्रेमात बुडालेली होती. आता तिच्या लग्नाची जबाबदारी तिच्या मावशीकडे होती. ती तिच्या लग्नाचा विचार करत होती. ती तिच्यासाठी गावोगावी स्थळे पाहत होती.उर्मिला तिच्या प्रेमाची हाकीकत मावशीला किती सांगायचे याचा विचारत होती. गावी असलेले वडिलांनाही तिला सांगायचे होते.मयूरव उर्मिला याबद्दल विचार करत होते. त्यावेळी त्यांना प्रश्न पडला की आपलं प्रेम होईल का?लग्नात दोन्ही घरची लोकं परवानगी देतील का? गावाकडची लोक काय म्हणतील? लग्न करण्यास कोण बाधा आणेल. असे नाना प्रकारचे प्रश्न सतत मनात घोळत होते. हे बाजू तिच्या मैत्रिणीना सांगत असताना. एका मैत्रिणीने तिला एस्ट्रोलॉजी कन्सल्टिंग असे सुचवले.त्यावेळी तीला मनोमय ज्योतिष केंद्र संचलित. ज्योतिष पंडित स्नेहा माने यांच्याकडे आली त्यांच्याकडून तिने वैयक्तिक मार्गदर्शन घेतले.समुपदेशन करताना तिने सुरुवातीला तिची सर्व हकीकत सांगितली. नुकतीच शेवटच्या वर्षाची परीक्षा दिली आहे. आई नसल्यामुळे मावशी कडे राहते मावशी सांभाळ करते. त्यामुळे मावशींनी तिच्या लग्नाची पूर्ण जबाबदारी उचलली होती. परंतु तिच्या मावशीच्या गावातील एक मयूर नावाचा तरुण आवडत होता. तोही एकटाच आई वडिलांचे छत्र हरवले होते. आजी आजोबा बरोबर राहत होता. शेती करत एका ठिकाणी नोकरी करत होता. त्यांचा असा प्रश्न होता की आमचे प्रेम आहे पण बाहेर सांगायला भीती वाटते घरातील लोकं कशी प्रतिक्रिया देतील. त्यांनी जर हे आमचे नाते नाकारले तर कसे होईल?दोघांच्या पत्रिका पाहिल्यावरअसे आढळून आले की मुलीच्या पत्रिकेमध्ये शुक्र हा बलवान स्थितीत होता. मी प्रेम विवाहाचे योग बोलके होते. त्याप्रमाणे पत्रिके वरून दोघांचे स्वभाव पाहिले. उर्मिला तशी स्थिर, धीमी, विचारी, मनाचा तोल जाऊन देणारी, शांतपणे काम करणारी, कोणत्याही बदलास व परिस्थितीस सामोरे जाणारी, वरून जरी ती प्रत्यक्ष रागिट वाटली तर मन प्रेमळ आहे. धाडसी पण थोडी अहंकारी आहे.नेहमी गुप्त राहणारी लपवणारी अशा स्वभावाचा असल्याने, आपल्या मनाचा थांगपत्ता लागू देत नाही. जरा काही मनाविरुद्ध झाले की लगेच राग व्यक्त करणे व स्पष्ट बोलक्या मनाची आहे. मयूरची ही पत्रिका पाहिली. चंचल ,प्रेमळ, दयाळू, प्रेमाचा भुकेला, संवेदनशील, नेहमी स्वप्नात रंगणारा, मनमोकळे आणि पारदर्शक आणि जेणेकरून जीवनात सुख व आनंद निर्माण करण्यात तरबेज होता. मोठ्या मनाचा, कुटुंबावर खूप प्रेम करायचा, त्याच्या आईवर ही खुप प्रेम करायचा. मित्र परिवारही मोठा होता. असा सात्विक, सदाचारी नेहमी दुसऱ्याच्या हिताचा विचार करणारा अशामुळे इकडे समाजशील, सहनशीलता होती.त्यांचा पुढचा प्रश्न होता की आमचा प्रेमविवाह योग आहे का?कुंडलीत असे दिसत होते की, समाजाचा विरोध असला तरी, मित्र जीवापाड मदत करत होती. मित्र-मैत्रिणीची मदत मिळेल. दोघांचेही लाभेश बलवान होते.गावातील बहुतेक व्यक्तींना समजले. मयूर च्या घरातील व्यक्तींनी सहमत दाखवली. उर्मिला च्या मावशी काकांनी यावर विचार केला. आणि तिच्या वडिलांना बोलावून यावर चर्चा केली. अखेरीस लग्नाला होकार मिळाला. आणि त्यांचा विवाह यशस्वी झाला. याचे कारण कुंडलीतील शुक्राची स्थिती उत्तम होती. परंतु जोडण्यासाठी राहू-केतू ची बाधा येत होती. त्या पद्धतीने राहू-केतू ची उपासना वाढवली. व मनापासून उपाय केले.

item.content:encoded:
Rahu

Rahu-Ketu inauspiciousness

will reduce the intensity of saturn

Hello!

 

We always analyze the planetary zodiac changes and their effects from time to time. Accordingly, we are studying two planets J Rahu and Ketu which will change in the coming April month on 12th April. Rahu will enter Aries from Taurus and Ketu will enter Libra from Scorpio. What effect will they actually have? We are studying it according to the zodiac. What will be the effect of this change on Libra today? We will understand this in detail. #rahuketuparivartan

To understand the importance of Rahu and Ketu’s change of zodiac, we have to first understand the information of these two planets. Suppose Venus is a planet along with Rahu in a native’s journal, then it will work to create ownership in the mind of the native. How should my partner be? How smart must that be? Should he be tactful or should he talk to others or not? The planet representing all these things is Rahu. Ketu has opposite mindset. This will work even if the spouse is pregnant. It will work no matter what. A person with no color combination can also love someone. Because in the caste of such castes there is a combination of Ketu and Venus. The special thing is that the world of such castes is also very good. Because Ketu does not care about these things.

Although the planets Rahu and Ketu are related to each other, they are both at different ends. Therefore, their effect is also opposite to each other. We can call Rahu the misery of Kaal. This is a shadow planet. He has a tendency to take revenge. It is also believed to be the cause of alcoholism and other bad habits. Accidents, theft, accidents, dacoity, displacement are all considered factors. But this does not completely spoil Rahu. He has some good stuff too. Rahu means to achieve something by working hard. Rahu means getting something quickly, enjoying material pleasures to the fullest. Therefore, in today’s 21st century, Rahu is of great importance in today’s modern era.

The planet Ketu has the opposite effect. It is the planet of liberation. Ketu is doing the work of taking man on the path of spirituality. If Ketu is strong in the horoscope of a person, then that person gets away from all the temptations of life. He is different than all. The causative planet of spirituality is actually three. These three planets are Saturn, Jupiter and Ketu. But there is a fundamental difference between these three. That is, Shani Maharaj tells the caste to behave with morality, justice and go towards salvation. Guru Maharaj tells Jataka that first complete all the actions, all the obligations and move towards salvation. So Ketu tells Jataka to renounce everything and move towards salvation. Of course Ketu is a planet that somewhere denies responsibility, we can say. Its effects are terrifying. Where he sits in the magazine, he works to create distance in the relationship. He is trying to destroy the causality of the planet he is sitting with. It also makes a distinction between the position in which it is sighted. Man gets bored because of the planet Ketu. So Rahu and Ketu’s zodiac sign is happening on 12th April. Rahu will enter Taurus from Aries and Ketu will enter Libra from Scorpio. What will be the effect of this change on Libra? Let us understand it now. 

 Looking at Libra, the arrival of Rahu will be in your seventh place. Also Ketu will arrive in your zodiac. Because these two planets change zodiac at the same time. Both start their journey at 180 degrees from each other and with rotational motion. Actually, these two planets are not points and their journey starts from a curved path. The impact of this visit is huge. Because both these planets are sitting firmly in the same zodiac for one and a half years. That is, Rahu and Ketu are the longest-lasting planets after Saturn in a zodiac. So this Rahu is in your seventh and Ketu is in your zodiac. They are showing a different kind of struggle in your life. I will also tell you the results of this struggle. However, Tul caste people should not be afraid of this. Because during this time Shani Maharaj is going to help you a lot. Therefore it is necessary to consider not only the fruits of Rahu-Ketu but also the auspicious results of Shani Maharaj or even Guru Maharaj. We will tell you that separately according to the amount.

Looking at the effect of Rahu, Rahu situated in the seventh house works to increase the ego of the partner somewhere. Takes your partner away from you or creates hatred between the two. At the same time, he loses family health. disturbs the peace of the family. So you have to take proper care of it. The world has said that a vessel must contain a vessel. However, it will be very important for you to take care that no controversy should arise. As you know Rahu has total three aspects: fifth, seventh and ninth. That is, he is seated at one place and his vision falling at three places is affected by the position of Rahu at four places. Accordingly, the fifth aspect of Rahu in the seventh position will move to the eleventh position. The eleventh place in the magazine is known as the place of profit and fulfillment of desires. After that the seventh sight will fall on your zodiac sign which is the first place and the ninth sight will fall on the third place which means strength and hard work. From the point of view of Rahu, being in the position of wish fulfillment from the seventh house, Rahu acts to not let your wishes come true or give everything other than what you want. Because their role is mainly in the case of non-fulfillment of their wishes.

The sight falling on Rahu’s zodiac will increase anger in your mind. At the same time, frustration can also increase. Because Ketu is also sitting there. The planet Ketu is the cause of depression. Your role will be to ignore a question or remain silent on something. You will have to face a lot of difficulties for this role. Because when we are constantly persecuted, wronged, harassed or harassed by our relatives, we are constantly thinking in our mind. In fact, it’s completely out of mind. Then somewhere its efficiency decreases. This could happen to you. Because in the week, the sight of Rahu will also fall at the place of your labor. From there he will work to remove your shortcomings. But even if all this is true, then the most important thing is that on April 29, Shani Maharaj will change your zodiac and enter your fifth place. From there his third vision will fall on Rahu. Saturn and Rahu are friendly planets. Also, Shani Maharaj is the Raja Yogakaraka planet of your magazine. Therefore Shani Maharaj will work to reduce the intensity of all the ill effects of Rahu that I have just told you. So it won’t bother you much. #bestastrologerinmaharashtra

In case of Ketu change, the coming of Ketu in your zodiac will work to change your thinking. This will constantly fill your mind with negative thoughts. All the bad things that are happening in the world are happening with me, this feeling will be formed in your mind. Whenever this feeling arises in your mind, I am giving you a suggestion that you should remember the dialogue between Karna and Lord Krishna at such a time. Which I also mentioned in some videos at that time. In this, Karna says, “Why all this happened to me? I was born and abandoned by my mother. what’s wrong with me? With this he presented all the miseries of life in front of Lord Krishna. Then Lord Krishna says to him, “You are telling this to a person who was planned to kill before birth. He was taken away from his mother as soon as he was born.” This is how Lord Krishna tries to calm his mind by telling him everything.

Accordingly, ‘Why in my case?’ When you say so, you really have no right to say it. Because at that time many other auspicious works were done only in your case. Therefore Tul castes are specially advised to control their mind. Ketu coming to the zodiac and marriage place will try to take you away from you. Will try to create disappointment in the mind. In such an adverse situation, you have to overcome all these things of your own free will and move towards progress. Shani Maharaj will definitely help you in this work.  Overall even though it may have a negative effect on Tul castes but with the help of Shani Maharaj you are going to have a successful journey.

I think this information is sufficient to understand the effect of Rahu-Ketu change on Libra. So let’s stop here in today’s episode. In the next section, we will study the effects on the next zodiac sign. So let’s see you again in the next part.

Thank you!

 

Good luck!

item.content:encoded:
अपनी प्रेमिका को खुश रखने का मंत्र | Love | Love Story | Prem | quotes | quotes in english | Real Love | Real Love Story | real lover

Real Love | Real Love Story | real love quotes | Love |

मेष राशि

Real Love | Real Love Story | real love quotes | Love | , यदि आपके प्रेमी या प्रेमिका की मेष राशि है, तो आपको एक ऐसा व्यक्ति मिला है जो जिद्दी, निडर, मजबूत, साहसी, तेज, महत्वपूर्ण है। आपका प्रिय कोई अजनबी नहीं बल्कि तूफान है। इसे ध्यान में रखते हुए, उन्हें समझना कठिन है, आपके लिए जीवन बदलने वाला साथी खोजना कठिन है, क्योंकि आप मुखर, मुखर हैं, भले ही थोड़ा कड़वा हो, आपको यह जानकर खुशी होगी कि उनका प्यार सच्चा है।

वृषभ


यदि आपका प्रेमी या प्रेमिका वृष राशि से है तो आपका प्रेमी या प्रेमिका वृष राशि से है।यह उनका सपना है, उनका मन प्यार में डूबा हुआ है, उनके चारों ओर निरंतर प्रेम का विचार लिपटा हुआ है, ऐसा प्रेमी या प्रेमी सुंदरता से प्यार करता है। उनके कला कौशल के साथ उनकी मदद करें, उनकी मदद करें, जानेमन या प्रेमी किसी की तारीफ करने के लिए पीछे मुड़कर न देखें, वे हमेशा तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ, तारीफ करना भी पसंद करते हैं। तारीफ, तारीफ तारो ताही के प्रेमी जैसा खुशमिजाज व्यक्ति मिलना आपकी नियति है या एक प्यार भरा स्पर्श ही काफी है।

मिथुन राशि


अगर आपका प्रेमी या प्रेमिका मिथुन है तो खुश रहें अगर आपका प्रेमी या प्रेमिका मिथुन है तो आपको यह स्वीकार करना होगा कि आप हमेशा खुश और उत्साहित रहते हैं क्योंकि आपका प्रिय बहुत सुंदर है, ये लोग हमेशा आपके बारे में सोचते हैं। वे गलतियाँ करते हैं क्योंकि उनके पास बहुत अच्छा कौशल है, मीठी बात करने वालों से सीखते हैं, बहुत प्यारे और शरारती होते हैं, लगातार दूसरों का दिल जीतते हैं, मिथुन प्रेमी अपने साथी को खुश रखने के तरीके सोचते हैं, और धम्मल एक मजेदार मजाक है। ऐसा माहौल, इसलिए यदि आपका प्रिय व्यक्ति मिथुन राशि में है, तो हमेशा चैट करें और मज़े करें!

कैंसर


प्यार का भूखा इंसान प्यार का भूखा होता है। कर्क राशि वाले बहुत प्यार करने वाले, दयालु, भावुक, स्नेही, भावुक, प्यार में बहने वाले होते हैं। ये प्रेमी प्यार के लिए उत्सुक होते हैं। अगर ऐसा प्यार भरा रवैया साथ दिया जाए, तो सुख आकाश में मावेनसा बन जाता है।कर्क राशि वाले खुले विचारों वाले और पारदर्शी होते हैं, पानी की तरह, दूसरों के जीवन में खुशियाँ और आनंद पैदा करते हैं, लोगों को सुखी जीवन जीने की कला देते हैं, बड़े दिल वाले बेहद संवेदनशील सुखी परोपकारी होते हैं, साथ देते हैं तो खुश रहते हैं।

सिंह


यदि कोई प्रिय सिंह हो तो तेजतर्रार व्यक्तित्व वाला सिंह होता है, हर अदा राजा के समान होता है मानो मोदेन एक सिद्धांत है जो झुकता नहीं है, अपमान में भी, ये लोग थाली हैं। !

कन्या


यदि आप कन्या राशि में हैं तो अपने प्रियजन को कैसे खुश रखें कन्या राशि वाले हमेशा अपने साथी को लेकर चिंतित रहते हैं। वे सोचते हैं कि वे क्या नहीं चाहते हैं, उनके हित हमेशा शीर्ष पर हैं, उनका प्यार कभी विफल नहीं होता है, बहुत प्यार और कोमल दिल वाले व्यक्ति को ढूंढना मुश्किल है! आपके साथी कितनी भी गलतियाँ करें, ये लोग आपको उनकी दया, क्षमा और शांति दिखाएंगे, भले ही उनकी सहनशीलता एक सीमित सीमा तक सीमित हो। ये लोग मदद करने के लिए तैयार हैं, उन्हें खुश रखने की शक्ति है प्यार से बुलाओ!

तुला


अगर किसी प्रियजन के पास संतुलन है, तो आपके जैसा भाग्यशाली कोई नहीं है, अपने प्रेमी को बहकाने की आपकी इच्छा आपको आहत करती है। एक-दूसरे के सुख-दुख बांटने की कला, समझने की वृत्ति के कारण ऐसा साथी पाकर आप अपने आप को भाग्यशाली समझते हैं। अगर आप उन्हें खुश करना चाहते हैं, तो उन्हें स्पेस दें और उन्हें प्रोत्साहित करें

वृश्चिक


यदि आपका प्रेमी या प्रेमिका वृश्चिक राशि का है तो यह व्यक्ति अंतरतम विचारों को लागू नहीं करता है, भले ही वह भावुक हो, अंदर से स्नेही हो। क्रोधित लोगों के मन में गहरे संघर्ष को समझना आवश्यक है, यह है कड़ी मेहनत, दृढ़ता, दृढ़ता को प्रोत्साहित करने के लिए पर्याप्त है।

धनु राशि


अगर आपका प्रिय व्यक्ति धनु है, तो भगवान का शुक्र है कि आपके जैसा भाग्यशाली कोई नहीं है। धर्मराज में सुखी, चंचल, परोपकारी, आशावादी, प्रेममय, सौम्य, बुद्धिमान, धार्मिक, विनम्र, विनम्र, दयालु, आदर्श राजा, सभी गुण पाए जाते हैं। उनके अच्छे कामों का समर्थन करें ताकि वे खुश रहें।

मकर राशि


अगर आपका प्रियजन मकर है तो आपको खुश रखने का एक तरीका है उस स्थिति में कैसे खुश रहें, हमेशा मेहनती कैसे रहें नहीं, भले ही वे इतने भावुक न हों, वास्तविकता से अवगत व्यक्ति व्यक्त करना चाहता है सच्चे प्यार में सरल तरीके से, उनके दुख को प्यार की जरूरत होती है।

कुंभ राशि


यदि आपका प्रेमी या प्रेमिका कुंभ राशि का है तो व्यक्ति यथार्थवादी, गंभीर, बुद्धिमान, अध्ययनशील, गंभीर स्वभाव का होता है। विचारशील प्रकृति वास्तविकता को महत्व देती है हालांकि भावनात्मक नहीं, यह प्यार में सच है।

मीन राशि


अगर आपका प्रिय मीन राशि का है तो ये लोग बहुत भावुक, संवेदनशील, हमेशा खुश रहने वाले, प्यार करने वाले स्वभाव वाले, सबका दिल जीतने वाले, उदार, स्वभाव के होते हैं। जो दूसरों की परवाह करता है, जो दिल से प्यार करता है, वह दूसरों के मन में घर बनाने पर अपना ठिकाना भी नहीं जानता। जो लोग भावनात्मक वास्तविकता से पूरी तरह से अनजान हैं वे एक ऐसे व्यक्ति से प्यार करते हैं जो उनके जैसा ही प्यार का नजरिया रखता है। अगर आप इस व्यक्ति को खुश करना चाहते हैं, तो उनका ख्याल रखें, उन्हें दिल से प्यार करें।

इस ब्लॉग को पढ़ने के लिए धन्यवाद!

item.content:encoded:
Find Your Love with Help of Astrology using all Zodiac Signs.

Aries

Mantra to keep your girlfriend happy. If your boyfriend or girlfriend has Aries zodiac sign, then you have got such a person who is stubborn, fearless, strong, courageous, quick, important. Your loved one is not a stranger but a kind of storm. With that in mind, it’s hard to understand them, it’s hard for you to find a lifelong partner, since you are outspoken, outspoken, even if a little bitter, you will be happy to know that their love is sincere.

Taurus


If your boyfriend or girlfriend is from Taurus then your boyfriend or girlfriend is from Taurus. This is their dream, their mind is immersed in love, the thought of constant love is wrapped around them, such a lover or lover loves beauty. Help them with their art skills, help them, sweethearts or lovers do not look back to compliment someone, they also always like to compliment, It is your destiny to find a happy person like Taro Tahi’s lover or a loving touch is enough.

Gemini


If your boyfriend or girlfriend is Gemini then keep it happy! If your boyfriend or girlfriend is Gemini then you have to admit that you always stay happy and excited because your loved one is very handsome, these people are always thinking of you It is rare for them to make mistakes as they have very good skills, learn from sweet talkers, are very sweet and naughty, constantly win the hearts of others, Gemini lovers think of ways to keep their partner happy, and Dhammal is a fun joke. They also create such an environment, so if your loved one is in Gemini, always chat and have fun!

Cancer


A person who is hungry for love is a person who is hungry for love. Cancer lovers are very loving, compassionate, emotional, affectionate, passionate, flowing in love. These lovers are anxious for love. If such a loving attitude is accompanied, then happiness becomes Mavenasa in the sky.

Cancer loved ones are open-minded and transparent, like water, create happiness and joy in the lives of others, give people the art of living a happy life, very sensitive happy philanthropist with a big heart. If accompanied, they remain happy.

Leo


If a loved one is a Leo, then the person who has a flamboyant personality is a Leo, every Ada is like a king. It is as if Moden is a principle that will not bend, even in humiliation, these people are plates. Give!

Virgo


How to keep your loved one happy if you are in Virgo? Virgo loved ones are always worried about your partner. They think about what they don’t want, their interests are always on top, their love never fails, it is difficult to find a person with a very loving and tender heart! No matter how many mistakes your mate may make, these people will show you the kindness, forgiveness, and peace they have, even though their tolerance is limited to a limited extent. These people are ready to help, the power to keep them happy is to call with love!

Libra


If a loved one has a balance, then there is no one as lucky as you, your desire to seduce your lover hurts you. You consider yourself lucky to have found such a mate because of the art of sharing each other’s joys and sorrows, the attitude of understanding. If you want to make them happy, give them space and encourage them

Scorpio


If your boyfriend or girlfriend is Scorpio, then this person does not apply the innermost thoughts, even though he is passionate, he is affectionate on the inside. It is necessary to understand the deep struggles in the minds of those who are angry, it is enough to encourage hard work, perseverance, perseverance.

Sagittarius


If your loved one is Sagittarius, thank God there is no one as lucky as you. Happy, playful, philanthropic, optimistic, loving, gentle, intelligent, religious, humble, humble, compassionate, ideal king, all the qualities are found in Dharmaraja. . Support the good deeds they have so that they will be happy.

Capricorn


If your loved one is Capricorn then there is a way to keep you happy. How to be happy in that situation, how to always be industrious No, even though they are not so passionate, a person who is aware of the reality wants to express true love in a simple way, their sadness needs love.

Aquarius


If your boyfriend or girlfriend is Aquarius then the person is realistic, serious, intelligent, studious, serious in nature. Thoughtful nature gives importance to reality. Though not emotional, it is true in love.

Pisces


If your loved one is Pisces then these people are very emotional, sensitive, always happy, loving nature, winning everyone’s heart, generous, temperament. The one who cares for others, who loves with all his heart, does not even know his whereabouts when he makes a home in the mind of others. People who are completely unaware of the very emotional reality love a person who has the same attitude of love as them. If you want to make this person happy, take care of them, love them from the heart.

item.description:
प्रेमिकाला आनंदी ठेवण्याचा मंत्र.
वृषभ राशीचे प्रेयसी किवा प्रियकर यांना प्रेम भरा स्पर्श सुद्धा पुरेसा ठरतो, यांच्यासारखी आनंदी व्यक्ती तुम्हाला मीळणे हे तुमचे भाग्य.

The post तुमच्या प्रेमिकाला आनंदी ठेवण्याचा मंत्र. appeared first on Manomay Jyotish.
item.content:encoded:
मेष

तुमच्या प्रेमिकाला आनंदी ठेवण्याचा मंत्र.तुमच्या प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी ची राशी मेष असेलतर धडपडी, बेधडक, पराक्रमी, धाडसी, चटपटीत, महत्वकांशी अशी व्यक्ती तुम्हाला मिळाली आहे. तुमची प्रिय व्यक्ती ही आगळीवेगळी नसून एक प्रकारचं वादळ आहे. हे लक्षात घेऊन, त्यांना समजून घेणे, तुमच्यासाठी जीव ओवाळून टाकणारा जोडीदार असा मिळणे अवघड आहे, स्पष्टवक्ता स्पष्टव्यक्त पणा असल्यामुळे, रोखठोक बोलणे, थोडीशी कडवट असली तरी, त्यांच्या प्रेमात प्रामाणिकपणा असतो हे ओळखलं तर तुम्ही आनंदित राहाल.

वृषभ

तुमचा प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी वृषभ राशीचे असेल तरतुमचा प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी वृषभ राशीचे असेल तर खऱ्या आयुष्यात तो आनंद घेणारा, आयुष्याची रंगाची चव चाखणारा, कला सौंदर्याची पारख करणारा, कलेची ओढ, कलेत मंत्रमुग्ध होणे, सुगंध याचा दरवळनारा , त्यांचे जीवन जणूकाही चित्रपटातील एखाद्या प्रेमी गोष्टी प्रमाणे असे त्यांचे स्वप्न असते, त्यांचे मन प्रेमात बुडलेली असते, सतत प्रेमाचा विचार अवतीभोवती गुरफटलेला असतो, अशा प्रेयसीला किंवा प्रियकराला सौंदर्याची आवड असते. त्यांच्याकडे असलेल्या कला कौशल्याचा साथ द्या त्यांना मदत करा, अशी प्रेयसी किवा प्रियकर एखाद्याची कौतुक प्रशंसा करायला मागेपुढे पाहत नाहीत, त्यांनाही नेहमी कौतुक हे प्रशंसा केलेले आवडते, अगदीच एखाद्या वेळी कौतुकाची थाप द्यावी, अगदीच काही नाही तर त्यांच्या सौंदर्याचं कौतुक करावे, तेही जमत नसेल तर आपुलकीने विचारपूस करावी, वृषभ राशीचे प्रेयसी किवा प्रियकर यांना प्रेम भरा स्पर्श सुद्धा पुरेसा ठरतो, यांच्यासारखी आनंदी व्यक्ती तुम्हाला मीळणे हे तुमचे भाग्य.

मिथुन

तुमचा प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी मिथुन राशीचे असेल तर त्याला आनंदित ठेवण्याचे रहस्य!तुमचा प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी मिथुन राशीचे असेल तुम्ही नेहमी आनंदित आणि उत्साही राहता राहतात हे मान्य करावेच लागेल कारण तुमची प्रिय व्यक्ती अतिशय रूपवान आहे, या व्यक्ती नेहमी सतत तुमचा विचार करत असतात, यांचा संवाद कौशल्य अतिशय व्यवस्थित असल्याने त्यांच्याकडून चुका होणे मात्र दुर्मिळच असते, गोड बोलून काम करून घेणे यांच्याकडून शिकावे, स्वभा अतिशय गोड आणि खोडकर असल्याने सतत दुसऱ्यांचे मन जिंकत असतात, मिथुन राशीचे प्रिय व्यक्ती आपल्या जोडीदाराला खुश कसे ठेवता येईल या पद्धतीने विचार करतात, आणि धम्माल मस्ती विनोदी असे वातावरणही तयार करतात, अशावेळी तुमचं प्रिय व्यक्ती मिथुन राशीचे असेल तर नेहमी गप्पा गोष्टी, आणि मजेत राहा!

कर्क

कर्क राशीच्या प्रिय व्यक्तीला आनंदी ठेवण्याचे मार्गप्रेमाची भुकेली व्यक्ती म्हणजे कर्क राशीचे प्रियकर अतिशय प्रेमळ ,दयाळू, भावनाप्रधान, वात्सल्य, प्रेमात वाहत जाणारे भावुक असे प्रियकर तुम्हाला लाभले आहेत, या प्रियकर व्यक्ती प्रेमासाठी व्याकुळ असतात विरह सहन होत नाही, प्रेमाच्या विवंचनेत सतत विचार करत असतात, अशा या प्रेम व्यक्त करणारा वृत्तीला साथ दिली तर आनंद गगनात मावेनासा होतो.

कर्क राशीच्या प्रिय व्यक्ती या मनमोकळ्या स्वभावाचे व पारदर्शक अशा असतात, पाण्याप्रमाणे इतरांच्या जीवनात सुख व आनंद निर्माण करतात, लोकांना आनंद जीवन जगण्याची कला देतात, अत्यंत संवेदनशील आनंदित परोपकारी विशाल हृदयाच्या अशा प्रेमी व्यक्तीला थोडे जरी दुखावले तर मनोविकार याला बळी पडतात, जर त्यांच्या मनाप्रमाणे तुम्ही साथ दिली तर ते आनंदित राहतात.

सिंह

प्रिय व्यक्ती जर सिंह राशीची असेल तरबोलण्यात चालण्यात जो रुबाबदार व्यक्तिमत्व असेल ती व्यक्ती म्हणजे सिंह राशीची, प्रत्येक अदा ही राजा प्रमाणे, मनोबल आत्मविश्वास हा खचाखच भरलेला असतो, कोणतेही गोष्टीकडे सकारात्मक बघण्याचा कल या व्यक्तीकडून शिकावा, अस हे आदर्श व्यक्तिमत्व सर्वांना दिलखेच ठरतं, स्वाभिमान तर जणू मोडेन पण वाकणार नाही अशा तत्त्वाचे असते, मान अपमानामध्ये पण या व्यक्ती ताट असतात, अशा व्यक्ती तुम्हाला लाभलेअसतील तर तुमच्या कर्तुत्वाला उभारी द्या, उमदेपणा ला खरे पणा ला साथ द्या, त्यांच्या उदार पणाचे कौतुक करा, मात्र अति आत्मविश्वासाला नियंत्रण ठेवा, कर्तुत्वान वर्तनाला प्रेरणा द्या!

कन्या

तुमची प्रिय व्यक्ती जर कन्याराशीचे असेल तर आनंदित कसे ठेवाल?कन्या राशीच्या प्रिय व्यक्ती नेहमी जोडीदाराच्या काळजीत असतात. काय हवाय नकोय याचा विचार करतात, त्यांच्या आवडीनिवडीचा वरती नेहमी लक्ष असते, त्यांची माया कधीच अटत नाही, अतिशय प्रेमळ कोमल हृदयाची व्यक्ती मिळणे कठीण! जोडीदारांनी कितीही चुका केल्या तरीही या या व्यक्ती त्यांच्याकडे असलेली दया-क्षमा-शांती दाखवतील, असे असले तरी त्यांचे सहनशील वृत्तीही एका मर्यादित प्रमाणात असते, अशी प्रिय व्यक्ती तुम्हाला लाभलेली असताना, त्यांना जोडीदाराकडून, गोड बोलणे, प्रामाणिकपणा, शांतता याची अपेक्षा असते, जोडीदाराला नेहमी मदत करण्यासाठी या व्यक्ती तप्तर असतात त्यांना आनंदी ठेवण्याचं सामर्थ्य म्हणजे प्रेमाने एक हाक मारा!

तूळ

प्रिय व्यक्तीची जर तूळ रास असेल तर तुमच्यासारखे भाग्यवान कोणी नाही, तुमच्या प्रियकराला नटणे मुरडणे ची हौस तुम्हाला घायाळ करते, विलास सी ,प्रेमी ,कामासक्त आकर्षक, रसिक असल्याने प्रेम कसे करावे ते यांच्याकडून शिकावे. एकमेकांच्या सुख दुःख जाण्याची कला, समजूतदार पणाची वृत्ती या गुणांमुळे तुम्हाला असा जोडीदार लाभला असल्याने तुम्ही स्वतःला भाग्यवान समजता. तुम्ही खुश करायचे असेल तर त्यांच्या कलागुणांना वाव द्या, प्रोत्साहन द्या

वृश्चिक

तुमचा प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी वृश्चिक राशीचीअसेल तर या व्यक्ती मुळातच आतल्या मनाचा थांगपत्ता लागू देत नाही, तापट हेकट असले तरी आतून प्रेमळ असतात, निश्चय,महत्वकांशी, डोळे भेदक नजरेने जोडीदाराला प्रेमात पडतात,अशी प्रिय व्यक्ती तुम्हाला लाभली,अती प्रेम करणारी,चिडली तर तेवढीच हक्काने रागवणारी,यांच्या मनातील खोल संघर्ष समजून घेण्याची आवश्यकता असते,धडपड,जिद्द, चिकाटी, कर्तुत्व ला प्रोत्साहन यांच्यासाठी पुरेस आहे.

धनू

तुमची प्रिय व्यक्ती धनु राशीचे असेल तर देवाचे आभार माना तुमच्यासारखे नशीब वान कोणी नाही. आनंदी, खेळकर, परोपकारी, आशावादी, प्रेमळ मनाने सज्जन, बुद्धिमानी धार्मिक वृत्ती, नम्र, विनयशील, दयाळू आदर्श धर्मराजाला लागणारे सर्व गुणधर्म आढळतात, दुसऱ्यांना मदत करताना प्रदर्शन न करता ही ओळख दुसऱ्याचे भले करतात, कोणताही गर्व न बाळगता नेहमी दुसऱ्यांची मदत संरक्षण करण्यासाठी झटतात. त्यांच्याकडे असलेल्या पुण्यकर्म ला साथ द्या म्हणजे ते आनंदी होतील.

मकर

तुमची प्रिय व्यक्ती मकर राशीचे असेल तर आनंदी ठेवण्याचा मार्गआहे त्या परिस्थितीत कसा आनंद मिळवावा, नेहमी कर्मशील कसे रहावे, कामात तडफदार करारी, उद्योग प्रिय, स्वावलंबी अशा गुणांची व्यक्ती तुम्हाला लाभली आहे, या प्रिय व्यक्तीकडून तुमची कधीच फसवणूक होणार नाही, तुमच्या धेयात कधीच अडचणीत आणणार नाहीत, एवढे भावुक नसली तरी वास्तवाची जाण असलेले अशी प्रिय व्यक्ती खरे प्रेम साध्या प्रमाणे व्यक्त करण्याची इच्छा असते, त्यांच्यातील उदासी ला प्रेमाची गरज भासते.

कुंभ

तुमचा प्रियकर किंवा प्रेयसी कुंभ राशीचे असेल तरया व्यक्ती वास्तववादी, गंभीर, बुद्धिमान, अभ्यासू, गंभीर स्वभावाचे असतात, स्वातंत्र्य प्रिय असल्याने जोडीदारालाही मोकळीक देतात. विचारी स्वभाव असल्याने वास्तवतेला महत्त्व देतात, भावु क नसले तरी प्रेमात खरे पण असतो, कुंभ राशीच्या प्रिय व्यक्तीला आनंदी ठेवण्याचा मंत्र बौध्दिक विचारा ना महत्व द्यावे.

मीन

तुमची प्रिय व्यक्ती मीन राशीच्या असेल तर या व्यक्ती अतिशय भावनाशील, संवेदनशील, नेहमी आनंदित, प्रेमळ स्वभावाच्या, सगळ्यांचे मन जिंकणारे, उदार, स्वभावाचे असतात. दुसऱ्यांची काळजी घेणारे मनापासून प्रेम करणारे, दुसऱ्यांच्या मनात कधी घर करता त्याचा थांगपत्ताही कळत नाही. अतिशय भावुक वास्तवाची बिलकूल जाण नसलेली व्यक्तींना त्यांच्या सारखेच प्रेम करण्याची वृत्ती असलेली व्यक्ती आवडते. या व्यक्तीला आनंदी ठेवायचे असेल तर त्यांची काळजी घ्या, मनापासून प्रेम करा.

हा ब्लॉग वाचल्या बद्दल, धन्यवाद!

आपल्या प्रतिक्रिया comment जरूर कळवा.
